#summary Showed using of tool as a quick overview.

= Simple steps of using =

 * Wrap all diagnostic instances by a special wrapper.
 * At all points, where we catch exception, we can capture the diagnostic information and use it in our will.
 * If an exception happened, the library system collects all information about and we can use it. For example, to log this data to the file or console.
